'''1.6.4 Build 13''' is the thirteenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released in March 2014. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Changes ==
* Students can no longer use ender pearls to teleport over border blocks.
* Updated all translations.
* Removed some old buttons from Server Launcher.
